attributes.description: Sporty, powerful and spacious family SUV. This full house, fuel efficient Tiguan has it all, from the sporty styling to the panoramic roof, spacious cabin area with everything you need just a touch of a button away. The powerful 2.0 TDI motor and 6 speed manual transmission with cruise control gives you a comfortable drive no matter how far you are going. Easy finance arranged for you with all the major banks. We pay the best prices for your trade in. We are an approved Planet42 Dealer.

Your Silver lining has arrived, and it's in the form of this stunning, Silver Fortuner with a powerful 2.8L paddle Shifting auto gearbox which is still buttery smooth.
This Toyota, like the majority of Toyota's, still runs perfectly and is ready to tackle your next big trip with ample space in the back.
With the amazing 4x4 capabilities the Fortuner will never let you down on any terain.
This is a Pre-Owned Vehicle and Well looked after, Roadworthy given, Clean Vehicle, All Trade-ins Welcome, Financing available at all major Banks, Nationwide delivery, For the best deals in S.A. Don't hesitate, contact us today! Trusted by thousands of loyal customers.

attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
